hive.reporting package¶

hive.reporting.detailed_reporter module¶

class hive.reporting.detailed_reporter.DetailedReporter(io)[source]¶

Bases: hive.reporting.reporter.Reporter

A class that generates very detailed reports for the simulation.

report(sim_state, instructions, reports)[source]¶

Takes in a simulation state and a tuple of instructions and writes the appropriate information. :type reports: Tuple[str, …] :param reports: :type sim_state: SimulationState :param sim_state: :type instructions: Tuple[Instruction, …] :param instructions: :return:
